title: Quinoa and Oat Porridge
directions: Combine the quinoa, oats, sugar, cinnamon, milk, and 1 2‚ÅÑ3 cups water in a small pot. Cook, stirring often, until very tender, 25 to 30 minutes.
Stir in the raisins and cook until softened, 1 to 2 minutes. Serve with the nuts, banana, and more milk and brown sugar, if desired.
ingredients: 2tablespoons brown sugar, plus more for serving
toasted nuts and chopped banana, for serving
